nodes.text: Z'ozpheratu was a male Twi'lek who lived during the Galactic Civil War. Some of his most recognizable features were his glowing yellow eyes. After the Battle of Yavin, he helped organize the Galactic Moon Festival in Mos Eisley and Moenia in the name of Jabba the Hutt himself. During the Galactic Moon Festival he received the visitors of the planet and the tourists of other planets. He was well known for transform into skeletons, phantoms and Kowakian monkey-lizards celebrating that party in an "usual" way.
